actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to limit the application of stock voting rights pass-through to certain employee stock ownership plans, and for other purposes.
short_title: Employee Stock Ownership Plan Expansion Act

summary.text: Employee Stock Ownership Plan Expansion Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to repeal the voting rights pass through requirement as it applies to employee stock ownership plans of closely-held corporations. Allows the acquisition of nonvoting common stock by employee stock ownership plans if the employer has a class of nonvoting common stock outstanding and the specific shares acquired have been issued and outstanding for at least 24 months.

titles.title: Employee Stock Ownership Plan Expansion Act
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to limit the application of stock voting rights pass-through to certain employee stock ownership plans, and for other purposes.
